intro.description: This kind of analysis gives you an overview of the number of tables and the number of rows per table. It counts also the number of indexes and primary keys...

item.title: Set the analysis metadata.
item.description: This step opens the analysis creation wizard. You can right click on the "Analysis" folder or on a column (or click the link below). This wizard helps you to fill the analysis metadata (name, purpose, description....), choose the connection to analyze and optionally set some filters on tables and/or views to restrict the analysis.

item.title: Review your settings
item.description: This step allow you to review and change your analysis settings in the open editor.

item.title: Analyze.
item.description: To execute the analysis, click on the "Run" button at the bottom of the editor (or click the link below). You can run the analysis with a context menu on the "Analysis" objects in the "DQ Repository" view
